data.name: RPGScenery - Dragon Bones Scene
data.detailed_description:
Legend has it that hidden in the depths of the desert, there is a portal which leads to the land of dragons. The gate was once guarded by dragons, who allowed only those deemed worthy, to enter. The location of the gate is now long forgotten, even the ever-dangerous guardians remain only as withered bones.

This DLC contains 4 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
